shortDescription: A loop with an unreachable exit condition can be triggered by passing a crafted JPEG file to the Lepton image compression tool, resulting in a denial-of-service.
vulnerabilityName: lepton_project lepton Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
